hero.name: Rotha Dapravith
hero.title: Full-Stack Developer | DevOps Engineer | Innovator
hero.description: A Full-Stack Developer and DevOps Engineer with 2+ years of experience building scalable solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Professional Profile
about.paragraph1: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with over 2 years of experience in building scalable web applications and implementing DevOps solutions. With a strong foundation in Java Spring Boot, React, and modern DevOps practices, I focus on creating efficient, secure, and user-friendly applications.
about.paragraph2: My experience includes developing enterprise applications, implementing Single Sign-On systems, and containerizing applications with Docker. I'm passionate about creating clean, maintainable code and automating deployment processes.
about.paragraph3: I hold a degree in Information Technology and have completed specialized training in DevOps practices, including containerization, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure as code.

current.title: Full-stack Web Developer
description: Design and maintain Java-based applications using Spring Boot framework
Implement Single Sign-On (SSO) integration using OAuth2 and OpenID Connect with Keycloak
Collaborate with front-end teams to integrate server-side logic and ensure seamless user experience
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices
Optimize application performance and troubleshoot complex issues
Stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies
Work under the supervision of Ministry of Post and Telecommunication (MPTC)

job1.title: Software Development and DevOps Intern
description: Contributed to DevOps integration and SSO initiatives
Designed web client applications optimized by Keycloak
Managed automation deployment, Dockerized applications, web server configuration, and secure sites
Assigned domain names for system projects and hosted all
Set up Telegram for project deployment monitoring and Jenkins CI/CD pipeline alerts

job2.title: Web Developer Internship
description: 2-month internship on Delivery Service Management System
Utilized MERN Stack (MongoDB, ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS)
Developed mobile apps for QR code scanning

job3.title: DevOps Training

description: Covered Linux OS, Docker containerization, Nginx reverse proxy

items.title: Single Sign-On System and DevOps
